exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gamePower" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0" source="loading_04_png"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="loading_02_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="backpackPanel" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="m_imgBg" width="640" height="1394" source="backBg2_jpg" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="m_imgMaskBg" width="640" height="1050" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" x="10" y="10" source="backBg2_png" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="m_imgCurtain" width="640" height="1240" source="common1_png" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="135"/>
	<e:Image id="m_imgLine" width="840" height="50" horizontalCenter="0" x="50" source="backBg5_png" top="-22"/>
	<e:Label id="m_labItemName" text="名字" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="363" anchorOffsetY="0" height="39" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="3.5" verticalCenter="-7.5"/>
	<e:Label id="m_labItemDesc" text="说明" fontFamily="Microsoft JhengHei" anchorOffsetX="0" width="455" anchorOffsetY="0" height="108" verticalAlign="top" textAlign="left" size="20" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="66"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnReturn" label="返回" right="15" top="24"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnRight" label="右" right="15" verticalCenter="-94"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnLeft" label="左" verticalCenter="-94" left="20"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnUse" label="左" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="220"/>
	<e:Image id="m_itemCenter" width="100" height="100" horizontalCenter="-11" verticalCenter="-94"/>
	<e:Image id="m_itemLeft" width="80" height="80" horizontalCenter="-138" verticalCenter="-94"/>
	<e:Image id="m_itemRight" width="80" height="80" horizontalCenter="115" verticalCenter="-94"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="bottomBtn" width="640" height="124" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="m_groupBtn" height="124" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" y="0">
		<e:Button id="m_btnItem" label="" x="0" y="7" height="110" width="181">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn3" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn3"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="m_btnAchieve" label="" x="230" y="7" height="110">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn2" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn2"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="m_btnRank" label="" x="460" y="7" height="110">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn3" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn3"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="victoryPanel" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="mask_png"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnReturn" label="返回" left="20" top="21"/>
	<e:Group id="m_groupGameOver" width="445" height="500" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Button id="m_btnAgain" label="Again" x="172" y="421"/>
		<e:Image source="backBg4_png" height="388" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" top="0"/>
		<e:Image left="0" right="0" source="backBg4_png" height="43" y="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labTitle" text="本次得分" x="162.5" y="6.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labScore" text="56" x="198.5" y="174" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="40"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labHistory" text="历史最高分：" x="65.5" y="341.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labHistoryScore" text="1000" x="256" y="341.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="left"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameScenePanel" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="m_imgScene" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="backBg2_jpg"/>
	<e:Group id="m_groupGame" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="m_imgMask" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="m_imgCurtain" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group id="m_groupScore" width="309.09" height="60" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" left="41" top="45">
		<e:Image width="70" height="60" x="0" y="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn6"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labScore" text="0" x="78" y="10.61" textColor="0xed1717" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="40" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:ProgressBar id="m_proPower" width="500" height="44" anchorOffsetX="0" value="5" skinName="gamePower" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.5" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="380"/>
	<e:Group id="m_groupGesture" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="172" touchThrough="false" touchEnabled="true" touchChildren="true">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="m_btnPause" label="暂停" x="515.67" y="45.61"/>
	<e:Group id="m_groupBottom" height="170" y="966" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0.36"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameStart" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="m_imgBg" source="bg_jpg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="m_imgLine" source="backBg5_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="-22"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnSetting" label="" width="100" height="100" right="0" top="3">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn4" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn4"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="m_btnGameStart" label="开始游戏" width="199" height="103" x="220.5" y="408">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"  source="btnSheet_json.btn7" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn7"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="30" size.down="27"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="m_btnRank" label="排行榜" width="199" height="103" x="220.5" y="568">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn7" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn7"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="30" size.down="27"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="m_btnProc" label="背包" width="199" height="103" x="220.5" y="716">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn7" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn7"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="30" size.down="27"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="settingPanel" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="m_imgMask" source="mask_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnReturn" label="返回" left="12" top="11"/>
	<e:Group id="m_groupSetting" width="466" height="590" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
		<e:Image height="43" y="0" source="backBg4_png" left="0" right="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		<e:Label text="设  置" x="147.5" y="6.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="171"/>
		<e:HSlider id="m_sliderSound" width="240" height="20" x="159.5" y="221"/>
		<e:HSlider id="m_sliderBGM" width="240" height="20" x="159.5" y="295"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
